content: Equip yourself with the party accessory of the future when you wear the light up sound reactive glasses. The glasses contain color changing lights that pulsate to the rhythm of the music in order to enhance your party experience – in addition to your drug trip.

Be prepared to get wasted at any given moment with the beer bottle opener ring. Forged out of stainless steel, this handsome looking ring serves the dual purpose of adorning your hand in addition to popping open your favorite brew with a flick of the wrist.

Save money on colognes and body sprays simply by adding the bacon soap to your bathing arsenal. After every shower you’ll get to enjoy the succulent bacony aroma exuding from your pores all day long. It even comes in a classy tin so you can take it with you on the go.

Your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man is swinging by to make sure you get a great night’s sleep on the Spider-Man bed. Apart from keeping the streets safe, he’ll also ensure you get the comfort you deserve on this uniquely styled twin bed.

Nothing goes together better than coffee and donuts — put these two delicious breakfast treats in one place with the donut coffee mug. This mug looks like that sprinkly donut you just took a bite out of, and it holds the refreshing and essential caffeinated beverage.

Splash a stylish redneck-inspired touch to any party with the tiny trucker hats. They come in assorted colors so you can coordinate or select your favorite color and each feature a special surface on the front so you can write or draw whatever you wish.

The sparks between the couple on the naughty outlet cover decal are undeniable. This raunchy decal’s risque design converts any dull outlet into a comical portrait of a couple getting down and dirty; no dorm room or bachelor pad would be complete without it.

Travel to the mystical mushroom kingdom every time it gets dark out with the mushroom lamps. The fanciful lamps add a touch of nostalgic surrealism to any environment while providing a light source ideal for studying or chilling out with your favorite bong.

The sneaker wash and dry bag will keep every sneaker in your closet looking brand new. The sturdy mesh bag keeps the shoes separated from clothes during washes and conveniently hangs on the door of front loading dryers so they don’t bounce around.

Display your love  for ‘Murica with this glorious tank top that proudly displays our back to back World War championships. It’s guaranteed to make you the center of attention on the fourth of July. And if anyone doesn’t like it, they are terrorists. Made in China.

When it comes to toys, size matters. This summer you won’t find a better time than when playing with the giant beach ball. This ginormous beach ball stands at 12 ft tall and is made from a tough and colorful vinyl ideal for the beach, pool, or park.

Get Tony Stark to lend you a hand in saving all your important documents by storing them in the Iron Man hand USB drive. Developed in Stark Laboratories, the USB drives are not only reliable but let you carry a small piece of the famed Avenger wherever you go.

Celebrate the fourth in the most American way possible by baking some delicious apple pies with the baseball glove oven mitt. This 100% cotton mitt provides maximum comfort for cooking while its baseball design pays homage to America’s favorite pastime.

Don’t get caught in a survival situation without the firestarter keychain. This keychain really is hot stuff – it can start a fire with some kindling and just one click of your finger. Perfect for anyone who loves camping, mountain climbing, or the impending apocalypse.

Warning – tonight’s dinner is rated ‘R’ for really damn tasty! Diners under the age of 13 are not permitted at the dining room table unless accompanied by a parent or legal guardian. Vegetarian discretion advised. But first, here’s fifteen minutes of appetizers…

Put the missing puzzle piece back into your bedroom with the jigsaw puzzle piece mirror. The jigsaw mirror mimics a puzzle piece from the days you enjoyed doing 20,000 piece puzzles. Give your bedroom that super funky vibe with this fun mirror.

Walk on water without being all divine and righteous with the floating water mat. Once this thin and lightweight mat is spread over the water’s surface, it creates a comfortable and extremely buoyant surface capable of holding over 1,000 pounds.

Say goodbye to dripping ice cream as you step into the future of snacking with the motorized ice cream cone. With the push of a button, the colorful and vibrant plastic cone begins to spin so the ice cream gets consumed evenly without melting and spilling to your hands.

Say goodbye to sloppy and slanted highlights on your textbooks and notes once you begin using the transparent tip highlighter. The highlighter’s innovative design is made from a see-though material so the user can easily make straight markings on their work.

Show your blind faith and give praise to the holy flying spaghetti monster with this omnipotent car decal. Beautifully capturing our lord and savior – the flying spaghetti monster – in blasphemous like detail, this decal is sure to get your car keyed up in Bible belt like areas.

Get organized with your drinking addiction. The grip on this unobtrusive piece of genius allows you to stack up bottled and canned beer in a neat little pyramid so that you don’t have cans falling on your head when you go in to get a piece of cheese.

Make every day a waffle cone day with the waffle cone maker. The waffle cone maker takes a few simple ingredients and combines them to make the perfect container for ice cream and toppings. You won’t have to stand in line or pay twenty bucks, either.

For the alcoholic on the go, the key chain breathalyzer will help you stay within the confines of the law while you drink yourself into a dark abyss. It makes a great gift idea for college students, or anyone who’s ever starred on an episode of “Intervention”.

Give your furry friend an amusing and comical expression when you play a game of fetch using the grinning teeth dog toy. This novelty toy contains a set of big pearly whites that give the illusion your pet has learned to smile just like people.

Kick it old school with these floppy disk sticky notes. You still remember the days when the floppy was the premium in storing files and keeping your hacking under wraps — hearken back to a simpler time by placing these floppy disk stickies all over your office.

The shower shaving foot rest is the leg-shaving woman’s truest companion in the shower. For those women who like a clean shaven leg without the fuss of sitting down in the bath or falling down with legs splayed, this foot rest saves, and shaves, the day.

Eliminate the annoyance of sand all over your recreational area when you take the sand free beach mat on your next outing. This extraordinary beach mat is composed of a special material that lets sand slip right through the surface and fall underneath it.

Tech savvy alcoholics can rejoice with the bottle opener iPhone case protecting their coveted phones. The case is crafted from durable Polycarbonate and features a handy steel bottle opener that slides out of the back to open your beloved beer in a snap.

Provide some laughs for you and your friends while you feed the furry creatures in your tree some delicious grub using the squirrel head feeder. This novelty feeder hangs in the yard and creates the hilarious illusion the squirrel has an over-sized head when he goes to eat.

Dealing with a tangled cluster of wires will become a thing of the past with the mummy wrap headphone cord. This cool mummy wrap is made of biodegradable silicone and provides a cool and convenient way to keep your headphones neat and tidy all the time.

Give your home a Far East feel to it with this Sumo wrestler table. This highly detailed and hand painted glass top table features a practitioner of one oldest martial arts in the world – sumo wrestling – in an iconic wide stance.

Ward off night time monsters with the weapon of a mighty god when you possess Thor’s hammer night light. Endowed with unworldly powers, the hammer glows bright all night long so the soothing light provides an ideal environment for a peaceful night’s rest.

Add a jaw dropping centerpiece to any brunch or summer picnic with the watermelon shark fruit server. You’ll be able to serve your favorite fruits in a whimsically designed container whose vibrant colors will make the contents appear more succulent and fresh than ever.

Make your most drab outfits stand out by adding a little flair with the gold flakes nail polish. Once you bedazzle your nails with some gold flakes you’ll give the impression your hands are adorned with the finest jewels and gems available on the planet.

Defrosty the snowman isn’t doing so well since summer rolled around. You kept his coal eyes and carrot nose protected all winter, but with the first warm day, you had to protect him in a cup. His carrot nose and dead black eyes now only serve the job of keeping your drink cold.

The black cat stockings will bring you anything but bad luck – unless you happen to cross your legs. They’re the stylish stockings designed to turn your plain legs into a pair of cute black cats, complete with an adorable curvy tail in the back.

The glass ziploc bag is the candy bowl that looks like America’s favorite storage bag. If you’re looking for a really unique piece of flair for your dining room table, stick the glass Ziploc on it and have folks ask you why you’ve got a bag — they’ll never know it’s glass.

Add some backbone to your moving process with spinal cord tape, the decorative tape that gives your cardboard boxes the support they need. This packing tape will hold all of your mailings the refined bone structure and posture that they are seriously lacking.

You won’t have to be a talented baker to make your deserts come to life when preparing a batch using the 3D dinosaur cookie cutters. The molds create separate body parts you piece together to create amazing dinosaur cookies you can actually play with before eating.

Don’t let the night time stop you — even after the sun goes down, you can grill all you like while using the barbecue grill light and fan. This strong LED light attaches to the grill and provides rays to see by and a fan for pulling smoke away.

Strap a turtle onto your back everyday when you use the sea turtle backpack. This friendly guy looks like the lovely sea turtles you see laying their eggs on sandy beaches or gently drifting through the water. Since they are endangered, the bag’s not made of real turtles.

Your cat only drinks running water because he has discerning tastes. Water that has been sitting around gets stale and gross – why would a refined kitty stoop so low? Make sure that your cat is taken care of with this drinking fountain — it will please his kitty sensibilities.

The pencil ear buds are one pair of pencils you’ll never forget to take to class. The miniature pencils deliver a crisp and clear sound directly to your skull while simultaneously making it seem like you’ve plugged up your ears with school supplies from your backpack.

Resemble your favorite half human, half Vulcan character every time you answer the phone with the Spock ear iPhone case. This novelty case displays the graphic of Spock’s Vulcan ear to create the illusion it’s your ear when talking on the phone.

The dead man bookmark, also known as Mark, has sacrificed his life for the sake of your knowledge and entertainment. His body remains squashed by the sheer weight of the pages while his upper body points out where you left off as he calls out for help.

Display your autographed ball on your wall with ease thanks to the ball claw. Available in soccer ball, baseball, football, and basketball style claws, these handy wall mounts are great for showing off your prized possessions, or just keeping your floor free of loose balls.

The anime eyes sleep mask will keep you looking animated while you get a great night’s rest. The sleep mask keeps the environment pitch black even during the middle of the day while the anime-styled eyes transform you into your favorite anime character.

Wonder no more what life would have been like for Luke if his neglectful old man had been around more often with the Darth Vader and Son book. This adorably illustrated book features 64 pages of Star Wars themed hijinks, and makes a great gift for Father’s Day.

If you’re too cheap to install an actual hot tub on your porch, look toward getting an inflatable hot tub spa. This inflatable spa can hold up to four people, and will most certainly relax your tired muscles after a long day of being awesome.

Jesus does a lot more than just save – he backs up – and he does it in Jesus like fashion with this wooden cross USB drive. Capable of storing up to four gigabytes of holy data, this solid wood USB also works great for warding off vampires and Scientologists.

When you’re taking out more than just the trash, you need the Dexter trash bags. These heavy duty commercial grade trash bags are serial killer endorsed – so you can fill it up with just about anything and feel confident that they won’t ever rip or leak.

You won’t find a more qualified person to plug your tub than the scuba diver bathtub plug. Tethered to your plug, the adventurous scuba diver remains submerged for the entirety of your bath so you can enjoy it without fear of water levels becoming critically low.

Even if your kid doesn’t have what it takes venture in the great unknown, keep their dreams alive with the toy astronaut helmet. This novelty helmet is lightweight, comfortable, and ideal for any pint-sized astronaut to soar wherever their imagination takes them.

Everyone loves lying back and reading a book in bed at night, but no one loves it when their spouse turns off the light, leaving the book and reader in the darkness — with the book reading light, you can continue to read, while the darkness in the room is acceptable for sleep.

Pump up the jams with your favorite beverages this summer with the boombox cooler. The boombox cooler will take you straight back to the eighties, when it was super sweet to have a boombox on your shoulder. Plus, it keeps your drinks cool in style.

Why should all the color be confined to your beautiful 1080p screen? The MacBook rainbow keyboard injects some technicolor fun to the duller part of your laptop to create a unique and eye catching look everyone at the coffee shop will be dying to get their hands on.

Infuse any wardrobe with some techno flavor using the light up shoelaces. Whether you’re wearing your most expensive shoes or the oldest pair of sneakers in the closet, these luminous shoe laces will make any shoe shine like new.

If you need to rock out while traveling, the one watt, .34 pound mini amplifier is the right piece of gear for you. It makes your death metal jams sound totally sweet without the fuss and muss of a twenty pound amp. Your mom will be so glad you brought it with you at Christmas.

Condition your children into believing that doing chores around the house can be fun with the bubble lawn mower. Within a few weeks, they’ll be so well trained that you can shift them over to a real lawn mower and begin their life of house cleaning duties.

See who is at the door without even being at home with this clever doorbell camera app. Every time someone’s at the door, you get a notification sent to your smart phone that gives you the option of either answering or ignoring them if it’s a unwanted solicitor.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Lip Gloss
content: Do late night the right way when you hit the club wearing some glow in the dark lip gloss. This luminous shade of lip gloss comes in four different shades so you don’t repeat the same look twice and gives the lips a glossy plump look.

Never buy another wrench set again with the adjustable grip wrench – the versatile wrench that fits over any type of nuts and bolts. The adjustable grip wrench instantly adjusts to fit any small sized tubing or piping, from 1/2 inch to 3/4 inch.

The digital sketch pen lets you combine your innate artistic ability with your Photoshop skills in order to create works of art capable of rivaling those of the great Michelangelo or Da Vinci. Now any sketch or idea will be able to be refined through the magic of photo editing.

No matter how tight on space you are, the solar powered inflatable light provides all the illumination you’ll need, while taking up the same space as a sheet of paper. The innovative design makes this unique lantern waterproof, lightweight and 100% safe to use.

Take to the sky with our favorite mistempered feathered friends when you get behind the control of the Angry Birds R/C helicopter. You’ll utilize an easy to handle remote to guide the Angry Bird helicopter to prey on some unsuspecting victim, or green pig.

Harness the power of wind drag to make yourself into the fastest being on two legs using the resistance training parachute. The parachute allows for limited mobility as it tears away the weakness in you and replaces it with increased stamina and acceleration.

Become the proud owner of the Swiss Army knife of watches when you acquire one of these GoldenEye 007 watches. It makes a great gift idea for James Bond fans, Nintendo 64 gamers, or even international spies who love watches with hidden abilities.

Quit using boring toothpick holders that just sit there and do nothing and opt for the cactus toothpick holder instead. Stick toothpicks in this holder so that your cactus becomes super spiny, and when you need to get spinach out of your teeth, just pick out a spine.

Real men carry their groceries in one trip – and now with this clever one trip grocery bag holder you can make that single trip even easier. Simply hook the device around all of the bags, and grab the handle to bring in all the groceries while throwing out your back!

Be prepared for anything while on your <del>drug induced trip</del> adventure when you carry this replica Adventure Time sword. This down right algebraic weapon is cast out of space age plastic, and is capable of slaying foes in one fell swoop.

The solar jar lamps are the hip and eco-friendly alternative to the regular lamps that create a colorful nighttime atmosphere in the backyard with the flick of a switch. They provide a rustic touch to the yard while emitting a soft glow ideal for relaxing under the starry sky.

You already take your iPhone to bed with you, so why not take your iPhone pillow too? This pillow, made to look exactly like the iPhone 4, will make any Apple fanatic feel right at home. You can nuzzle the pillow with an iPad under one side of the pillow and the iPhone in hand.

Who needs Aquaman’s useless fish telekinesis when you wield power over the remote control shark. The shark combines robotics within a fierce exterior capable of swimming while completely submerged, and traveling up to 20 feet in range so you can terrorize any pool.

Protect your toddler the next time you venture out into traffic by placing them on the Batman booster seat. With the Batman seat, you’ll get some peace of mind and be able to concentrate on the road ahead knowing the Dark Knight himself is protecting junior.

Have the fastest draw in the West when you wield the camera hip holster. This convenient and easy to use holster is a great accessory for photographers that allows them to keep their cameras on hand without having to have them slung around their neck.

If sharing an umbrella isn’t romantic enough for you, now you can snuggle up with your sweetie under this heart shaped umbrella. Available in several colors, this cheesy umbrella is a must have for the romantic couple who want to disgustingly show off their love in public.

Get the best of both worlds with these chopstick eating utensils. Featuring the advanced chopstick style on one end, and the traditional fork and knife style on the other end for when you go into a rage after failing to pick up your food after numerous attempts.

Add some industrialist inspired ingenuity to any shelf or desk by keeping your private library organized with the vise grip bookends. Their fine craftsmanship and solid iron construction means they’ll stand firmly in place while complimenting the rooms decor.

Stay way ahead of the fashion curve by sporting 2015’s latest trends with the Marty McFly hat. This multicolored hat goes great with any outfit and is ideal for keeping your hair from flying all over the place when hover boarding around town.

Who lives in a pineapple-shaped Spongebob aquarium ornament? Your goldfish, that’s who. Give your aquarium the same flair as Bikini Bottom with a new residence for your fishy friend. Make it extra dorky by adding in a mini-Spongebob or Patrick.

Ditch the six pack abs and create a truly distinguishable look with these belly face temporary tattoos. With a multitude of faces to choose from, these temporary tattoo faces will add realism whilst you immaturely use your stomach fat to talk to people.

Switch through hair colors faster than you change outfits with the hair coloring chalk. This unique chalk comes in every color under the sun and allows you to temporarily dye your hair with the same ease as coloring a piece of paper. The chalk works great for pranks too.

Level up as a gamer when you begin using the iPhone joystick to take your mobile gaming to new heights. The joystick is compatible with thousands of games and allows for more precise movement during game play. You’ll be breaking high scores in almost every game.

Let the other cars on the road know who’s the king of the asphalt when your vehicle comes cruising by with a killer car mustache. Whether you happen to drive a big SUV or a smart car, this burly and dignified ‘stache will butch up any cars appearance.

Win the parent of the year award when you show up with your tough tot covered in baby tattoos. No matter how defenseless and dependent your infant acts, these tattoos are a great way to toughen them up and get them to stop acting so needy all the time.

Don’t let the summer heat stop you from having playful battles with your friends – now with these artifical snowballs you can wage war all year round without the messy wet slush! Each packet includes twenty snowballs so you’ll have plenty of ammo.

Whether you’re a raging alcoholic or just have a lot of guests to serve, the giant cocktail shaker is perfect for preparing  a bulk order of drinks in a single mixing session. No matter your tolerance, one or two drinks is all you’ll need to relax.

Descend into incognito mode and hide from the paparazzi with these identity censoring shades. These unique sunglasses don’t just block out harmful UV rays, they also make your face unrecognizable by placing a giant black bar over your eye area.

Say farewell to those sticky fingers next time you get your snack on using the Oreo dunking spoon. This unique utensil fits snuggly into the cookie so that you can conveniently soak it in delicious milk without making a mess or dropping it in the cup accidentally.

Prepare the <del>whips and chains</del> cutting board and spatula as you create the most erotic and delicious meal of your life using the Fifty Shades of Bacon cookbook. Every page contains tantalizing recipes guaranteed to make your mouth water.

Experience the mind-blowing power of science with gallium in your hands. This unique metal transforms from a solid to a liquid while in your hands because of its unusually low temperature melting point – and once you let it go it returns to a solid form.

Give your laptop some serious <del>street</del> gaming cred when you transform its appearance with the Street Fighter MacBook sticker. This sticker is made with transparent vinyl and displays the powerful Ryu turning the Apple logo into the power source of his next hadouken.

Disguise yourself as the mighty Vader or Chewy while showing off that fit and toned figure with the Star Wars skins suits. These skin-tight suits offer maximum flexibility and comfort while keeping true to the appearance of the Star Wars characters we all know and love.

Extend the flow of your faucet with this clever plastic piece that works with just about any type of bathroom sink. It’s the perfect bathroom accessory for those poorly installed faucet spouts that don’t reach out far enough to allow you to properly wash your hands.

Hey Hey – it’s your old pal Krusty in skateboard form! As you can expect from any trusted Krusty brand product, this quality longboard will last for years of extended use, won’t ever explode without warning, and definitely won’t give you un-explainable skin rashes.

Conquer the night as you trek through the unknown wilderness with the flashlight shoes leading the way. Each flashlight comes equipped with an ultra bright white LED for illuminating the darkest environments and two smaller red LEDs for going into stealth mode.

Pay homage to one of mankind’s greatest feats with the astronaut chandelier in your home. Great for children, it lets their imagination soar while providing ample lighting. It’s the out-of-this-world chandelier so great it would have probably been hanging in JFK’s own man cave.

Use Mother Nature to your advantage with help from the solar window charger. This eco-friendly charger carries specially made solar panels that utilize natural sunlight to efficiently charge various kinds of phones. It’s great for travelling or the outdoors.

Keep your pencil as sharp and pointy as the Captain’s unrelenting steel hook with the pirate peg leg pencil sharpener in your arsenal of school supplies. A few spins in this scallywag’s amputated leg and your pencil is as good as new, yaarrr.

Fire breathing dragons have nothing on the water breathers. If you have any doubt, just check out the dragon rainspout statue in action. During storms, the dragon statue begins spewing out a steady stream of water. It’s the perfect gift for any home.
